name: Drunken Brawl
description:
Drunken Brawl is a PvP arena platformer fighting game where two drunken idiots fight each other on top of the city skyline. The goal is to land three hits on your opponent!


Controls FunctionPlayer 1Player 2Pause menuEscEsc
Jump
WIMove left
AJFall through platform
SKMove right
DLDashC.AttackV/

Menu navigation is WASD, with Spacebar or Enter to select.

Artist: Alexandre Chu
Programmer: Brandt Willems

Soundtrack Credit: 

"Groove Grove" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
